title: Middle Eastern Elderly Male Seeking Stem Cell Anti-Aging in Japan

patient_profile.primary_concern: Age-related functional decline, seeking regenerative medicine

health_status.metabolic: Type 2 Diabetes, HbA1c 7.2%, on Metformin + Empagliflozin

patient_profile.patient_goals: Comprehensive regenerative program: stem cell therapy for joint repair, cognitive enhancement, and overall vitality restoration
patient_profile.budget: Family office managed, no financial constraint
patient_profile.travel_preference: Japan (spouse interested in combining with medical tourism)

clinical_note_ar: مريض ذكر يبلغ من العمر 68 عامًا من الرياض. يعاني من تراجع وظيفي مرتبط بالعمر. خضع لعملية تحويل مسار الشريان التاجي عام 2019. داء السكري من النوع الثاني مستقر. يرغب في العلاج بالخلايا الجذعية لإصلاح المفاصل والتجديد الشامل. يفضل اليابان كوجهة علاجية.
clinical_note_en: 68-year-old Saudi male with age-related functional decline. Post-CABG 2019, stable CAD. T2DM controlled. Bilateral knee OA Grade III. MoCA 26/30. Seeking comprehensive stem cell regenerative program including joint repair, cognitive support, and vitality restoration. Prefers Japan as treatment destination. Family office backing with no financial constraint.

search_intent.primary: Stem cell therapy for joint regeneration and anti-aging
search_intent.secondary: Comprehensive regenerative medicine program in Japan

expected_agid_outputs.title: Helene Regenerative Medicine Clinic
expected_agid_outputs.program: Comprehensive Stem Cell Rejuvenation Program (MSC-IV + PRP + Exosome)
expected_agid_outputs.certification: Japan PMDA Regenerative Medicine Class II

expected_agid_outputs.title: Keio University Hospital - Department of Regenerative Medicine
expected_agid_outputs.program: Autologous Adipose-Derived MSC for Knee Osteoarthritis (Clinical Study)

expected_tdls.stage_1: Pre-screening: cardiac clearance + renal function assessment
expected_tdls.stage_2: Travel coordination: Riyadh → Tokyo (medical visa + interpreter)
expected_tdls.stage_3: Keio University MSC treatment for bilateral knees
expected_tdls.stage_6: Remote follow-up with Riyadh partner clinic (King Faisal Specialist Hospital)
